Operasi Bahu, Miguel Oliveira Juga Absen dari MotoGP Valencia
03 Nov 2019, 12:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Miguel Oliveira dipastikan akan kembali absen dalam pekan balap MotoGP Valencia, Spanyol, pada 15-17 November mendatang. Debutan Red Bull KTM Tech 3 ini akan menjalani operasi pada bahu kanannya di Austria, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Oliveira mengalami kerusakan ligamen pada bahunya usai tertabrak oleh Johann Zarco di Sirkuit Silverstone, Inggris, pada Agustus lalu. Kondisinya pun diperparah oleh kecelakaan hebat dalam kecepatan tinggi di Phillip Island, Australia, akhir pekan lalu.
Di Phillip Island, Oliveira terjatuh di Tikungan 1 akibat angin kencang dalam sesi latihan bebas keempat (FP4). Usai menjalani scan MRI di Melbourne, rider Portugal itu diketahui mengalami kerusakan tendon pada kedua pergelangan tangannya dan ligamen bahunya diketahui kian memburuk.

Shoulder Surgery, Miguel Oliveira Also Absent from Valencia MotoGP
Nov 3 2019, 12:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Miguel Oliveira will certainly be absent again in MotoGP racing week Valencia, Spain, on 15-17 November. Red Bull debut KTM Tech 3 will undergo surgery on his right shoulder in Austria, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Oliveira suffered ligament damage to her shoulder after being hit by Johann Zarco at the Silverstone Circuit, England, last August. His condition was made worse by a severe accident at high speed in Phillip Island, Australia, last weekend.
On Phillip Island, Oliveira fell on Bend 1 due to high winds in the fourth free practice session (FP4). After undergoing an MRI scan in Melbourne, the Portuguese rider was known to have damaged tendons in both wrists and his shoulder ligaments were known to be getting worse.
